reviewText: Funny and entertaining dark comedy. Funny twist at the end that I did not expect. :)
I had been wanting a copy of this movie for a long time. It is well acted & comical.it is a pleasure towatch.
This movie is very funny. Shirly Brener is hillarious as the lead. Very creative and original storyline, you won't be able to predict what happens next.

Joey Lawrence is all grown up and plays the role of a sensitive boyfriend yet secret hit man in this non traditional romantic comedy. The plot builds momentum when Charlotte (Shirly Brener) through online dating finally meets the perceived guy of her dreams, Lyle (Joey Lawrence).  A funny dark story emerges as Lyle, in an attempt to show his love starts adding her most despised people in life to his hit list. I really enjoyed this film and it has some surprising twists even my boyfriend would enjoy. I really loved all the great cast cameo appearances too!
